thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Talent Television and Film sees 2017 net profit up 11.7 pct to 39.6 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Talent Television and Film sees 2017 net profit up 11.7 pct to 39.6 pct

organizations.name: zhejiang talent television and film co ltd

text:
Jan 16(Reuters) - Zhejiang Talent Television and Film Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to increase by 11.7 percent to 39.6 percent, or to be 200 million yuan to 250 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 179.1 million yuan
* Says that increased income and profit of movie and television play as the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/eCZ5Jm
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
